readable.title: 3506216254_04d119cac7
readable.content: A guy wearing sunglasses is smoking . A man is standing amidst a crowd of people while smoking a cigarette . A young man is standing wearing a black jacket and pink shirt with a cigarette in his mouth . A young , stubbled man in sunglasses lights a cigarette on a city street . The scruffy young man smokes a cigarette on a busy street .
